item.title: C Programming Language Influence Network
item.description: A network graph showing 64 programming languages connected by 122 influence relations. It includes languages the were influenced by C or influenced C and C itself. More influential languages are shown as larger circles as compared to languages with less influence on others. The influence relation d… • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. item.title: Add a Logo
item.description: I added a simple logo reminiscent of a shell prompt to the main navigation as a link to the start page and as a favicon.

item.title: GitHub Search on Language Pages
item.description: There is now a GitHub search form on language pages, that you can use to search for repositories related to that language or whatever you type into the form...

item.title: Programming Languages Timeline
item.description: A timeline of programming languages based on the year of inception.

item.title: List of Programming Languages by Year
item.description: A list of 690 computer programming languages listed on programminglanguages.info by year.

item.title: Alphabetical List of Programming Language Paradigms
item.description: An alphabetical list of 65 paradigms used to classify programming languages currently listed on programminglanguages.info.

item.title: Types of Computer Programming Languages
item.description: An alphabetical list of 76 types used to classify programming languages currently listed on programminglanguages.info.

item.title: Alphabetical List of Programming Languages
item.description: An alphabetical list of all 1430 computer programming languages currently listed on programminglanguages.info.
